content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Aziz. Based on our initial discussions, we can agree to a rental price of €600 per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €600. I am a student, so I am on a budget, but I am willing to pay a fair price for a good apartment.

Do you have any other requirements or conditions that I should be aware of before we proceed with the lease agreement?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. Therefore, I would like to see a security deposit of €200 upfront. Additionally, I would like to include a clause in the lease agreement that allows me to increase the rent by 2% each year, subject to a maximum increase of €10 per month. Finally, I would like to see a minimum lease term of 12 months.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your requirements. I can provide a security deposit of €200 upfront, and I am willing to agree to the terms of the lease agreement that you propose. I will sign the agreement as soon as possible. Thank you for your time and consideration.

If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your understanding and cooperation, Aziz. I am glad that we were able to reach an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
